kese wethath 2009 dewana wara parikshana sandaha kalapa mangin sakas wu prashna pathra dosha sahithawa mudranaya wima sambandhawath, wiwidha akramikatha siduwim sambandhawath dadi wiwechana ella wiya.me siddhin kerehi janadhipathithumage sruju madihathwima matha mahacharya lal perera mahathage mulikathwayen yuth kamituwak mangin me siddhin pilibandawa wishleshanaya karini.ee anuwa 2009 thewana wara parikshanaya ha 2010 sita siyalu wara parikshana pasala mangin pawathwiya yuthu bawatath, siyalu balathala widuhalpathiwarunta pawarimatath janadhipathithuma adhyapana amathyanshayata niyoga kaleya.nawathath pasalwalata wara wibhaga pawathwime balaya labadima gana adhyapana baladharin menma pasal pradhanin ha guruwaru dakwu adahas meseya.adhyapana amathyanshaye lekam nimal bandara mahathapaha wasara shishyathwa wibhagaya, aposa samanya pela ha usas pela yana jathika wibhaga thunama pawathwenne adhyapana amathyanshaye ha wibhaga departhamenthuwe sahabhagithwayen.
anathurin lori rathayata da barapathala hani siduwuna.
